title: Transplanting a Tomato plant in a 4" pot to a gallon pot

tasks.task: Potting tomato plants from four-inch containers to gallon-sized pots.
subtasks: Open the four-inch container of the Oregon Spring Heirloom Tomato.
Add soil to the bottom of the gallon pot.
Plant the tomato deep in the pot, ensuring leaves remain above soil line.
Open and gently spread the roots of the tomato plant.
Apply Mycorrhiza fungus around the root zone for improved growth.
Fill the pot with soil, avoiding pressing down to prevent compaction.
Add water and a stake for support.
